Comments_List: Even though the class is titled "Gamelan Ensemble," you'll actually learn a lot about other aspects of Javanese culture, including religion, other performing arts in relation to gamelan (dance, wayang, etc.), Javanese history, and more!
How to play gamelan, culture of Indonesia.
Knowledge of Indonesian culture as it relates to gamelan and music. Skills in being able to play multiple instruments of gamelan ensemble.
all about music and culture i learned so much
Best class Ive ever taken at Yale.
Awesome course that doesnt require previous musical playing experience.
Yes! If you're looking to learn about a form of music that you may not encounter before coming to college, this is your chance. Gamelan is so cool!
yes! engaging and learned a lot
